short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add personal and private notes to movies/series on letterboxd.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes it possible for you to store your personal notes and thoughts about movies/series on letterboxd.com privately.

You can edit your notes right under the movie/series description directly on letterboxd.com.

You are also able to edit all notes on the overview page. Simply click the extension's icon and a new tab with the overview page will open.

 To generate a .csv file containing all your notes combined, visit the overview page.
_________________________________________________________________________________

This extension doesn't work with Google Chrome's sync storage, because of its capacity limitations. All your data is stored locally.

If you choose to uninstall this extension, make sure to generate and download your .csv file on the overview page, because your personal notes will be deleted.
